channel.title: admin on Tingting's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Tingting's Blog

item.description: I am a PhD student in the Department of Statistics at University of British Columbia (UBC). I’m currently working with Prof. Lang Wu. In 2013, I obtained my Master’ degree in Statistics from UBC. My master thesis was completed under the supervision of Prof. Lang Wu and with valuable advice from Prof. Paul Gustafson. In 2011, I received my Bachelor’s degree in Statistics from Zhejiang University of Finance and Economics in China.
